title: I need some help on PBE
body: I just got PBE pass today, I log in as I would to normal servers, but my money is just like how it looks like in normal servers. Isn't it should be some kind of creazy money? should't it be a saprate money system? waiting for answers, please.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
Are you certain that you've been granted PBE Access? I wasn't able to find a PBE account tied to this account. If you were instead granted access to the [Alpha Client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ), then you will be logging in with your normal account credentials, but instead, be using the *new client* that will eventually replace the current one. 

The PBE and Alpha Client are entirely **separate** systems, so if you have access to the **Alpha Client**, it doesn't mean you have access to the **PBE**. Let me know if you have any questions.
That clear everything.. too bad I did not get the BPE access... thanks though!
should I even get a new account and log in or what?
